item.title: 达拉斯联储博客称美国就业市场再平衡而非疲软

item.title: 特朗普的木材关税即将到来。谁将首当其冲

Starting Oct. 14, softwood lumber will face 10% duties, while kitchen cabinets, bathroom vanities, and other finished wood goods will be hit with 25% tariffs that rise further in January.】
